snippet: Nose tackle Josh Brent was charged with intoxication manslaughter after the vehicle he was driving flipped, killing Jerry Brown, a linebacker on the Cowboys’ practice squad.
abstract: Dallas Cowboys nose tackle Josh Brent is charged with intoxication manslaughter in car crash that killed teammate Jerry Brown; Irving police say vehicle driven by Brent hit curb at excessive speed and flipped at least once.
lead_paragraph: Nose tackle Josh Brent was charged with intoxication manslaughter after the vehicle he was driving flipped, killing Jerry Brown, a linebacker on the Cowboys’ practice squad.

headline.seo: Cowboys’ Josh Brent Charged in Teammate’s Death
headline.main: Dallas Player Dies in Crash; a Teammate Is Charged
headline.print_headline: Dallas Player Dies in Crash; A Teammate Is Charged
